title: The Video Game Movie Canon with Kahlief Adams
description: With the McElboys on tour, Plante and Frushtick bring in a special guest, Kahlief Adams of the Spawn on Me podcast, to talk about just what makes a great video game movie, and whether we could narrow down five that best represent the medium. Also, what's up with those Goombas?
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Kahlief Adams, Chris Plante, Russ Frushtick)
